properties.name: id
properties.title: id
properties.text: All gestures belonging to the same continuous gesture will have the same ID. Can be passed into `my_frame.gesture(my_gesture.id)` to get updated versions of a gesture.

properties.name: type
properties.title: type
properties.text: one of the following values: 'circle', 'swipe', 'screenTap', or 'keyTap'

properties.name: duration
properties.title: duration
properties.text: the duration (in microseconds) of the gesture, as of the frame from which the gesture was retrieved.

properties.name: state
properties.title: state
properties.text: one of the following value: 'start', 'update' or 'stop'; where in the "clown car o' gesture" stream the current gesture is -- the first, the last, or somewhere in the middle. Tap gestures will always have a 'stop' state.

properties.name: pointableIds
properties.title: pointableIds
properties.text: the ids of fingers associated with this gesture (if any)

properties.name: handIds
properties.title: handIds
properties.text: the ids of hands associated with this gesture
